verses.verse: וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Then the word יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to יֵה֣וּא <WH3058> came to Jehu בֶן־ <WH1121> the son חֲנָ֔נִי <WH2607> of Hanani עַל־ <WH5921> against בַּעְשָׁ֖א <WH1201> against Baasha לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

יַ֗עַן <WH3282> as אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> I הֲרִימֹתִ֙יךָ֙ <WH7311> Forasmuch as I exalted מִן־ <WH4480> from הֶ֣עָפָ֔ר <WH6083> thee out of the dust וָאֶתֶּנְךָ֣ <WH5414> and made נָגִ֔יד <WH5057> thee prince עַ֖ל <WH5921> over עַמִּ֣י <WH5971> over my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel וַתֵּ֣לֶךְ ׀ <WH1980> have walked בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way יָרָבְעָ֗ם <WH3379> of Jeroboam וַֽתַּחֲטִא֙ <WH2398> to sin אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֣י <WH5971> and hast made my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel לְהַכְעִיסֵ֖נִי <WH3707> to provoke me to anger בְּחַטֹּאתָֽם׃ <WH2403> with their sins

הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> behold מַבְעִ֛יר <WH1197> Behold I will take away אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> the posterity בַעְשָׁ֖א <WH1201> of Baasha וְאַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> and the posterity בֵית֑וֹ <WH1004> of his house וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <WH5414> and will make אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣יתְךָ֔ <WH1004> thy house כְּבֵ֖ית <WH1004> like the house יָרָבְעָ֥ם <WH3379> of Jeroboam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְבָֽט׃ <WH5028> of Nebat

הַמֵּ֤ת <WH4191> Him that dieth לְבַעְשָׁא֙ <WH1201> of Baasha בָּעִ֔יר <WH5892> in the city יֹֽאכְל֖וּ <WH398> eat הַכְּלָבִ֑ים <WH3611> shall the dogs וְהַמֵּ֥ת <WH4191> and him that dieth לוֹ֙ בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> of his in the fields יֹאכְל֖וּ <WH398> eat ע֥וֹף <WH5775> shall the fowls הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> of the air

וְיֶ֨תֶר <WH3499> Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> of the acts בַעְשָׁ֛א <WH1201> of Baasha וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> and what עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> and what he did וּגְבֽוּרָת֑וֹ <WH1369> and his might הֲלֹא־ <WH3808> not הֵ֣ם <WH1992> like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <WH3789> [are] they not written עַל־ <WH5921> in סֵ֛פֶר <WH5612> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> age לְמַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <WH7901> slept בַּעְשָׁא֙ <WH1201> So Baasha עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <WH1> with his fathers וַיִּקָּבֵ֖ר <WH6912> and was buried בְּתִרְצָ֑ה <WH8656> in Tirzah וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <WH4427> reigned אֵלָ֥ה <WH425> and Elah בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place

וְגַ֡ם <WH1571> Moreover בְּיַד־ <WH3027> And also by the hand יֵה֨וּא <WH3058> Jehu בֶן־ <WH1121> the son חֲנָ֜נִי <WH2607> of Hanani הַנָּבִ֗יא <WH5030> of the prophet דְּבַר־ <WH1697> came the word יְהוָ֡ה <WH3068> of the LORD הָיָה֩ <WH1961> came אֶל־ <WH413> against בַּעְשָׁ֨א <WH1201> against Baasha וְאֶל־ <WH413> against בֵּית֜וֹ <WH1004> and against his house וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> because כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הָרָעָ֣ה ׀ <WH7451> even for all the evil אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשָׂ֣ה ׀ <WH6213> that he did בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְהַכְעִיסוֹ֙ <WH3707> in provoking him to anger בְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> with the work יָדָ֔יו <WH3027> of his hands לִהְי֖וֹת <WH1961> being כְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in being like the house יָרָבְעָ֑ם <WH3379> of Jeroboam וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> because אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הִכָּ֖ה <WH5221> and because he killed אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853> פ

בִּשְׁנַ֨ת <WH8141> year עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> twenty וָשֵׁשׁ֙ <WH8337> and sixth שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> two years לְאָסָ֖א <WH609> of Asa מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah מָ֠לַךְ <WH4427> to reign אֵלָ֨ה <WH425> began Elah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son בַּעְשָׁ֧א <WH1201> of Baasha עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> over Israel בְּתִרְצָ֖ה <WH8656> in Tirzah שְׁנָתָֽיִם׃ <WH8141> year

וַיִּקְשֹׁ֤ר <WH7194> conspired עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> against עַבְדּ֣וֹ <WH5650> And his servant זִמְרִ֔י <WH2174> Zimri שַׂ֖ר <WH8269> captain מַחֲצִ֣ית <WH4276> of half הָרָ֑כֶב <WH7393> [his] chariots וְה֤וּא <WH1931> now he בְתִרְצָה֙ <WH8656> against him as he was in Tirzah שֹׁתֶ֣ה <WH8354> drinking שִׁכּ֔וֹר <WH7910> himself drunk בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> in the house אַרְצָ֔א <WH777> of Arza אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who עַל־ <WH5921> over הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> steward of [his] house בְּתִרְצָֽה׃ <WH8656> in Tirzah

וַיָּבֹ֤א <WH935> went in זִמְרִי֙ <WH2174> And Zimri וַיַּכֵּ֣הוּ <WH5221> and smote וַיְמִיתֵ֔הוּ <WH4191> him and killed בִּשְׁנַת֙ <WH8141> year עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> him in the twenty וָשֶׁ֔בַע <WH7651> and seventh לְאָסָ֖א <WH609> of Asa מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וַיִּמְלֹ֖ךְ <WH4427> and reigned תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place

וַיְהִ֨י <WH1961> came בְמָלְכ֜וֹ <WH4427> And it came to pass when he began to reign כְּשִׁבְתּ֣וֹ <WH3427> as soon as he sat עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסְא֗וֹ <WH3678> on his throne הִכָּה֙ <WH5221> [that] he slew אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> all the house בַּעְשָׁ֔א <WH1201> of Baasha לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not הִשְׁאִ֥יר <WH7604> he left ל֖וֹ מַשְׁתִּ֣ין <WH8366> him not one that pisseth בְּקִ֑יר <WH7023> against a wall וְגֹאֲלָ֖יו <WH1350> neither of his kinsfolks וְרֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <WH7453> nor of his friends

וַיַּשְׁמֵ֣ד <WH8045> destroy זִמְרִ֔י <WH2174> Thus did Zimri אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> all the house בַּעְשָׁ֑א <WH1201> of Baasha כִּדְבַ֤ר <WH1697> according to the word יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> which he spake אֶל־ <WH413> against בַּעְשָׁ֔א <WH1201> against Baasha בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> by יֵה֥וּא <WH3058> Jehu הַנָּבִֽיא׃ <WH5030> the prophet

אֶ֚ל <WH413> about כָּל־ <WH3605> all חַטֹּ֣אות <WH2403> For all the sins בַּעְשָׁ֔א <WH1201> of Baasha וְחַטֹּ֖אות <WH2403> and the sins אֵלָ֣ה <WH425> of Elah בְנ֑וֹ <WH1121> his son אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which חָטְא֗וּ <WH2398> by which they sinned וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> and which הֶחֱטִ֙יאוּ֙ <WH2398> to sin אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> and by which they made Israel לְהַכְעִ֗יס <WH3707> to anger אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> in provoking the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּהַבְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1892> with their vanities

וְיֶ֛תֶר <WH3499> Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> of the acts אֵלָ֖ה <WH425> of Elah וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> and all that he did הֲלֽוֹא־ <WH3808> not הֵ֣ם <WH1992> like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <WH3789> [are] they not written עַל־ <WH5921> in סֵ֛פֶר <WH5612> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> age לְמַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel פ

בִּשְׁנַת֩ <WH8141> year עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <WH6242> twenty וָשֶׁ֜בַע <WH7651> and seventh שָׁנָ֗ה <WH8141> year לְאָסָא֙ <WH609> of Asa מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah מָלַ֥ךְ <WH4427> reign זִמְרִ֛י <WH2174> did Zimri שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> seven יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> days בְּתִרְצָ֑ה <WH8656> in Tirzah וְהָעָ֣ם <WH5971> And the people חֹנִ֔ים <WH2583> [were] encamped עַֽל־ <WH5921> against גִּבְּת֖וֹן <WH1405> against Gibbethon אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לַפְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> which [belonged] to the Philistines

וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> heard הָעָם֙ <WH5971> And the people הַחֹנִ֣ים <WH2583> [that were] encamped לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> say קָשַׁ֣ר <WH7194> hath conspired זִמְרִ֔י <WH2174> Zimri וְגַ֖ם <WH1571> also הִכָּ֣ה <WH5221> and hath also slain אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וַיַּמְלִ֣כוּ <WH4427> king כָֽל־ <WH3605> all יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <WH3478> wherefore all Israel אֶת־ <WH853> עָמְרִ֨י <WH6018> made Omri שַׂר־ <WH8269> the captain צָבָ֧א <WH6635> of the host עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> over Israel בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he בַּֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> in the camp

וַיַּעֲלֶ֥ה <WH5927> went up עָמְרִ֛י <WH6018> And Omri וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <WH3478> and all Israel עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> from מִֽגִּבְּת֑וֹן <WH1405> from Gibbethon וַיָּצֻ֖רוּ <WH6696> with him and they besieged עַל־ <WH5921> and תִּרְצָֽה׃ <WH8656> Tirzah

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> become כִּרְא֤וֹת <WH7200> saw זִמְרִי֙ <WH2174> And it came to pass when Zimri כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נִלְכְּדָ֣ה <WH3920> was taken הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> that the city וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> that he went אֶל־ <WH413> into אַרְמ֣וֹן <WH759> into the palace בֵּית־ <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king's וַיִּשְׂרֹ֨ף <WH8313> and burnt עָלָ֧יו <WH5921> over אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> house מֶ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> the king's בָּאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> over him with fire וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <WH4191> and died

עַל־ <WH5921> because [חַטָּאתֹו כ] (חַטֹּאתָיו֙ <WH2403> of his sins ק) אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which חָטָ֔א <WH2398> which he sinned לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> in doing הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <WH1980> walking בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way יָרָבְעָ֔ם <WH3379> of Jeroboam וּבְחַטָּאתוֹ֙ <WH2403> For his sins אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> which he did לְהַחֲטִ֖יא <WH2398> to sin אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> to make Israel

וְיֶ֙תֶר֙ <WH3499> Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> of the acts זִמְרִ֔י <WH2174> of Zimri וְקִשְׁר֖וֹ <WH7195> and his treason אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which קָשָׁ֑ר <WH7194> that he wrought הֲלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not הֵ֣ם <WH1992> like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <WH3789> [are] they not written עַל־ <WH5921> in סֵ֛פֶר <WH5612> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> age לְמַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel פ

אָ֧ז <WH227> Then יֵחָלֵ֛ק <WH2505> divided הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> Then were the people יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לַחֵ֑צִי <WH2677> into two parts חֲצִ֨י <WH2677> half הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> of the people הָ֠יָה <WH1961> become אַחֲרֵ֨י <WH310> followed תִבְנִ֤י <WH8402> Tibni בֶן־ <WH1121> the son גִּינַת֙ <WH1527> of Ginath לְהַמְלִיכ֔וֹ <WH4427> to make him king וְהַחֲצִ֖י <WH2677> and half אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> followed עָמְרִֽי׃ <WH6018> Omri

וַיֶּחֱזַ֤ק <WH2388> prevailed הָעָם֙ <WH5971> But the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> that followed עָמְרִ֔י <WH6018> Omri אֶת־ <WH854> against הָעָ֕ם <WH5971> the people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> that followed תִּבְנִ֣י <WH8402> Tibni בֶן־ <WH1121> the son גִּינַ֑ת <WH1527> of Ginath וַיָּ֣מָת <WH4191> died תִּבְנִ֔י <WH8402> so Tibni וַיִּמְלֹ֖ךְ <WH4427> reigned עָמְרִֽי׃ <WH6018> and Omri פ

בִּשְׁנַת֩ <WH8141> year שְׁלֹשִׁ֨ים <WH7970> thirty וְאַחַ֜ת <WH259> and first שָׁנָ֗ה <WH8141> years לְאָסָא֙ <WH609> of Asa מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah מָלַ֤ךְ <WH4427> to reign עָמְרִי֙ <WH6018> began Omri עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> over Israel שְׁתֵּ֥ים <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> ten שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years בְּתִרְצָ֖ה <WH8656> he in Tirzah מָלַ֥ךְ <WH4427> reigned שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> six שָׁנִֽים׃ <WH8141> years

וַיִּ֜קֶן <WH7069> And he bought אֶת־ <WH853> הָהָ֥ר <WH2022> the hill שֹׁמְר֛וֹן <WH8111> Samaria מֵ֥אֶת <WH853> שֶׁ֖מֶר <WH8106> of Shemer בְּכִכְּרַ֣יִם <WH3603> for two talents כָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> of silver וַיִּ֙בֶן֙ <WH1129> and built אֶת־ <WH853> הָהָ֔ר <WH2022> on the hill וַיִּקְרָ֗א <WH7121> and called אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֤ם <WH8034> the name הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> of the city אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בָּנָ֔ה <WH1129> which he built עַ֣ל <WH5921> after שֶׁם־ <WH8034> after the name שֶׁ֔מֶר <WH8106> of Shemer אֲדֹנֵ֖י <WH113> owner הָהָ֥ר <WH2022> of the hill שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <WH8111> Samaria

וַיַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> wrought עָמְרִ֛י <WH6018> But Omri הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the eyes יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיָּ֕רַע <WH7489> and did worse מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who לְפָנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> than all that [were] before

וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <WH1980> walked בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all דֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> in all the way יָרָבְעָ֣ם <WH3379> of Jeroboam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְבָ֔ט <WH5028> of Nebat [וּבְחַטֹּאתָיו כ] (וּבְחַטָּאתֹ֔ו <WH2403> sin ק) אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הֶחֱטִ֖יא <WH2398> to sin אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> wherewith he made Israel לְהַכְעִ֗יס <WH3707> to anger אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> to provoke the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּהַבְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1892> with their vanities

וְיֶ֨תֶר <WH3499> Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֤י <WH1697> of the acts עָמְרִי֙ <WH6018> of Omri אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> which he did וּגְבוּרָת֖וֹ <WH1369> and his might אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> that he shewed הֲלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not הֵ֣ם <WH1992> like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <WH3789> [are] they not written עַל־ <WH5921> in סֵ֛פֶר <WH5612> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> age לְמַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <WH7901> slept עָמְרִי֙ <WH6018> So Omri עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <WH1> with his fathers וַיִּקָּבֵ֖ר <WH6912> and was buried בְּשֹׁמְר֑וֹן <WH8111> in Samaria וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <WH4427> reigned אַחְאָ֥ב <WH256> and Ahab בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place פ
